div.class: img-responsive no-border col-md-9 col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-push-3

span.span: Pick up time for Breakfast and Lunch
Pick up Location is behind the West Texas Elementary School Cafeteria
All meals are free to children ages 1 to 18
Children do not have to attend PSPCISD to receive a meal
Please remain in your car, we will deliver the meals to your vehicle
Your completion of this survey will greatly assist our food service staff in knowing how many meals to prepare but is not required for a lunch or breakfast.

div.label: I plan on picking up breakfast for my children.

a.title: Please provide the number of children ages 1 to 18 years you will be picking up.

div.label: I plan on picking up lunch for my Children

a.title: Please provide the number of children ages 1 to 18 years you will be picking up.

div.label: Please select the days of the week you intend on picking up meals.

div.strong: School Closure or the remainder of the 2019-2020 School Year

div.p: Today, Governor Abbott issued an Executive Order closing school’s for the remainder of this school year. PSPCISD will continue to provide instructional support through technology and instructional packets.

span.span: Meal Delivery outside of Stinnett City Limits
